io.spine.server.bus

Class MulticastBus<M extends io.spine.core.Signal<?,?,?>,E extends SignalEnvelope<?,M,?>,C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.bus.Bus<M,E,C,D>
      • io.spine.server.bus.MulticastBus<M,E,C,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - the type of outer objects (containing messages of interest) that are posted to the bus
    E - the type of envelopes for outer objects used by this bus
    C - the type of message class
    D - the type of dispatches used by this bus
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class MulticastBus<M extends io.spine.core.Signal<?,?,?>,E extends SignalEnvelope<?,M,?>,C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E>>
extends Bus<M,E,C,D>
    A Bus, which delivers a single message to multiple dispatchers.

    • Method Detail

      • callDispatchers

        protected int callDispatchers(E messageEnvelope)
        Call the dispatchers for the messageEnvelope.
        Parameters:
        messageEnvelope - the message envelope to pass to the dispatchers
        Returns:
        the number of the dispatchers called or 0 if there weren't any

        Called before the dispatching of the signal with the passed ID is started.

        Descendants may override this method and define their own logic on handling the dispatching lifecycle.

      • onDispatched

        protected final void onDispatched(io.spine.core.SignalId signal)
        Description copied from class: Bus
        Called after the dispatching of the signal to all of the target dispatchers has been completed.

        This method is called even if the dispatching of the message has failed.

        Descendants may override this method and define their own logic on handling the dispatching lifecycle.

        Overrides:
        onDispatched in class Bus<M extends io.spine.core.Signal<?,?,?>,E extends SignalEnvelope<?,M,?>,C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message>,D extends MessageDispatcher<C,E>>
        Parameters:
        signal - the ID of the dispatched signal
        See Also:
        Bus.onDispatchingStarted(SignalId)
